revtext:
All praise for Samatha.
She is one elegant lady I meet.
Its all because of her I bought the wig.
I am a crossdresser.
To get such kind of support, the comfort zone she provided.
Thank You from the bottom of my heart.

Thank You Sam.
Thank You Wigomania.
revreply:
Thanks very much for your appreciation and review. 
Samatha is a very passionate person who ensures no one is judged and offers her best support 
and advise to one and all.
